acts.act: Protection of Childern Sexual Offence Act 2012

business_details.Business: Judgment delivered. Accused person is convicted. He is sentenced to RI for 3 (three) years and a pay a fine of Rs. 1000, id to suffer R.I for 15 (fifteen ) days u/s 8 of POCSO Act.
